examples.example: 我的考试成绩从不及格提升到了满分，实现了从零到一百分的飞跃。

translate.english: My exam score has been raised from failing to full marks, achieving a leap from zero to one hundred.

examples.example: 即使从零开始，只要我们努力奋斗，也一定能创造出美好的未来。

translate.english: Even if starting from zero, as long as we strive hard, we will definitely be able to create a beautiful future.

examples.example: 生活中难免会遇到挫折，但我们要相信可以从零基础开始，重新出发，迎接美好的明天。

translate.english: In life, setbacks are inevitable, but we have to believe that we can start from scratch and set out again to welcome a beautiful tomorrow.
